page.title: 09INDUSTRY: STAFFORD PARK
page.content: Stafford Park is a new{Industrial Park built by{Telford Development {Corporation.}It has modern{electronic {industries}like:-{Unimation,}making robots to work in factories to replace human workers.{Merlin Gerin,}making circuit breakers.{Tatung}making audio and video tapes and equipment. It also has small businesses like agricultural suppliers, workers co-operatives, soft toy manufacturers. Stafford Park is still growing. It is now part of the{Enterprize Zone.}An Enterprize Zone is an area of Industrial land for Commercial Businesses. Firms do not have to pay rates for 10 years. New factories are being built. New factories will mean jobs in areas with 25% male unemployment.
